text: hwla' almtwadewn alkhashewn min sfathm 'anahum 'iidha dhukir allah wahdah khafuu eqabh, whadhiru mkhalfth, wa'iidha 'asabahum bas wshdt sabaruu ealaa dhlk mwmlyn althawab min allah eaza wjl, waddawa alsalat tamt, wahum mae dhlk yunfiqun mimaa razaqahum allah fi alwajib ealayhim min zakat wnfqt eyal, wman wajabat ealayhim nfqth, wafi sabil allh, walnfqat almsthbt
